Comment: Congress is in a failed state. The obsequiousness of the Republicans should make Americans wretch. Yet, the deep red states are filled with mindless zombies who hate American values, while believing they are “true patriots”. They want to win more than they want righteous leaders.  If there are any actual patriots on the Republican side of the aisle, this might be their last chance to stand up before America is officially a failed democracy. Every elected official will be pushed aside, jailed, or offed as soon as this is a dictatorship.  What legal measures are left on the table? Is there some weird, dusty procedure that could be used to at least buy time?
Author: industrial-complex
